Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.moveblocks

Class DoorActivityManager

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.api.restartable.Restartable
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.moveblocks.DoorActivityManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRestartable
@Singleton public final class DoorActivityManager extends Restartable
Keeps track of which doors are currently active.
Author:
Pim

  • Method Details

    • isDoorBusy

      public boolean isDoorBusy(long doorUID)
      Checks if a DoorBase is 'busy', i.e. currently being animated.
      Parameters:
      doorUID - The UID of the DoorBase.
      Returns:
      True if the DoorBase is busy.

    • attemptRegisterAsBusy

      public boolean attemptRegisterAsBusy(long doorUID)
      Attempts to register a door (as described by its UID) as busy. If the door was not previously registered as busy, it will be registered now and this method will return true. If it was already registered as busy, it will not touch it and return false.
      Parameters:
      doorUID - The UID of the door to register.
      Returns:
      True if the door was not registered before (but is now), otherwise false.

    • setDoorAvailable

      public void setDoorAvailable(long doorUID)
      Register a door as available.
      Parameters:
      doorUID - The UID of the door.

    • addBlockMover

      public void addBlockMover(BlockMover mover)
      Stores a BlockMover in the appropriate slot in busyDoors
      Parameters:
      mover - The BlockMover.

    • getBlockMovers

      public Stream<BlockMover> getBlockMovers()
      Gets all the currently active BlockMovers.
      Returns:
      All the currently active BlockMovers.

    • getBlockMover

      public Optional<BlockMover> getBlockMover(long doorUID)
      Gets the BlockMover of a busy DoorBase, if it has been registered.
      Parameters:
      doorUID - The UID of the DoorBase.
      Returns:
      The BlockMover of a busy DoorBase.

    • stopDoors

      public void stopDoors()
      Stops all doors that are currently active.
